package.name: Ars_Technica
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
A straightforward message style inspired by the latest Ars Technica layout. Features inline images (click to load, again to revert to a link, and shift-click to load in your default browser), as well as inline video playback.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=7338
